actions.message:
Hey ${tempVars("member")} Welcome to the BlackBull Games Discord Server 
before you start the fun please read our rules:
${serverVars("rules")}

[IMPORTANT]
Rules:
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
RULES:
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
1 | Be Nice to other members, we don't appreciate insults (Unless its ment to be a joke, but staff have the last say in it)
2 | advertisement is only for admins or special ranks (ranks will be known soon)
3 | Cursing is fine but if it goes to far or used as insults you will be punished according to the felony you committed. Anything NSFW/Racism is not allowed and result to ban
4 | Do not complain about your roles or the colours of your roles, the owner decides how this discord is run
5 | Staff has the last say, if you got problems with a staff member and you think they abuse their powers contact the Owner.
6 | Keep the chat English, if in the channel you all speak the same language then you dont need to speak english as long as everyone understands it 
7 | For the rest: Enjoy our server, enjoy your life , Enjoy the games , Enjoy the community 
8 | use the music bot only in the music voice chat
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Remind: Rules can change and not all rules will be into the rule sections , use common sense.
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
